page.title: 01Estates around Kingston
page.content:
This area is largely owned, as it has been for centuries, by two estates, centred on Encombe House and Smedmore House.
{Encombe House,}owned by the Scott family since the early 19th Century, is the focus of a large agricultural estate including three quarters of the village of Kingston.
{Smedmore House,}on land owned by one Ricardus at the time of the Domesday Book, has been owned since then by the Smedmore and Mansell families. This smaller estate is supported by opening the house to the public and to location filming, by a caravan site and by the tolls from a private road to Kimmeridge.
